title: I gained access to PBE but now I cant load the signup page, please help
body: I got an email that I had finally been accepted to the PBE on Novemeber the seventh.  So I tried to signup the moment I found out.  The only issue is everytime I go to the signup page it never stops loading and nothing else pops up.  I have tried to access the signup page from other internets and computers with no luck.  Can anyone help or at least tell me why i am not able to go to the signup page?

replies.body:
This issue can happen for a number of different reasons. I'd first recommend [clearing your browser's cache](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), before logging in from the [NA Homepage](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/) then continuing on to visit the [PBE Signup Page](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).

Let me know if this helped.

This issue did not help, I had my friend try to access the page as well and he could not load it either.  Is there something wrong with the page? thanks for your patience
edit: also when it finally does load something, it shows the error 505 something went wrong screen

Ah, so this error typically pops up if there are issues with your connection reaching the page. I'd recommend using a VPN such as [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/) or [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) to try to bypass this. Let me know if this worked for you.
